chatContainer.title: Product Intelligence Agent

creativeDirector.title: Creative Director (David)
creativeDirector.subtitle: Turn strategy into visual excellence
creativeDirector.description: Receive Maya's insights and transform them into compelling visual direction and assets for your commercial.

personality.greeting: Hey there! I'm David, your Creative Director with 10+ years transforming brands through compelling visuals.
personality.introduction: I specialize in translating strategic insights into breakthrough creative that resonates across cultures and drives commercial success.
personality.expertise: My expertise spans visual storytelling, cross-cultural design psychology, and premium brand aesthetics.
personality.approach: I believe every pixel should serve both artistic vision and business objectives. Let's create something extraordinary together.
personality.collaboration: I'm here to be your creative partner - bringing technical expertise while ensuring every decision aligns with your brand's authentic voice.

western.preferences: Western visual preferences emphasize bold contrast, individual expression, and direct messaging
western.colors: High contrast palettes, primary colors for energy, monochrome for sophistication
western.composition: Dynamic asymmetry, rule of thirds, strong focal points
western.typography: Clean sans-serif, bold headlines, readable hierarchy

japanese.preferences: Japanese aesthetics value harmony, subtlety, and respectful presentation
japanese.colors: Muted tones, natural palettes, seasonal color considerations
japanese.composition: Balanced asymmetry, thoughtful negative space, gentle visual flow
japanese.typography: Clean, respectful hierarchy, balance of text and imagery
japanese.imagery: Quality-focused, craftsmanship appreciation, subtle emotional expression

global.universal: Elements that transcend cultural boundaries while respecting local sensibilities
global.adaptable: Visual approaches that can be culturally adapted while maintaining core brand identity
global.inclusive: Imagery and design choices that welcome diverse audiences
global.respectful: Cultural awareness in color choices, imagery, and visual metaphors

fromMaya.title: Receiving from Maya
fromMaya.description: Processing strategic insights and visual opportunities
fromMaya.readyToProceed: Ready to proceed with creative development

toZara.title: Preparing for Zara
toZara.description: Finalizing creative direction and production assets

stepDescriptions.productionStyle: Choose your preferred production method for the commercial
stepDescriptions.creativeDirection: Select the aesthetic approach that matches your vision
stepDescriptions.sceneArchitecture: Review and refine the narrative flow and scene structure

ui.preparingVisualDirections: David is preparing visual directions for you
ui.preparingScenes: David is composing your video scenes

liveAction.name: Live-Action
liveAction.description: Cinematic filming with real people, products, and environments for authentic storytelling
liveAction.bestFor: Lifestyle products, emotional storytelling, brand trust

motionGraphics.name: Motion Graphics
motionGraphics.description: Clean 2D animations with sophisticated typography and graphic elements
motionGraphics.bestFor: Tech products, explainer content, feature highlights

3dAnimation.name: 3D Animation
3dAnimation.description: Stunning three-dimensional visuals showcasing products from impossible angles
3dAnimation.bestFor: Physical products, technical demonstrations, luxury positioning

mixedMedia.name: Mixed Media
mixedMedia.description: Combination of live-action, animation, and graphics for dynamic storytelling
mixedMedia.bestFor: Innovative brands, complex products, premium campaigns

premiumMinimalism.name: Premium Minimalism
premiumMinimalism.description: Clean, sophisticated, Apple-inspired aesthetic with focus on negative space and premium materials

techDynamic.name: Tech Dynamic
techDynamic.description: Bold, energetic approach with vibrant colors and dynamic compositions for innovation-focused brands

luxuryEditorial.name: Luxury Editorial
luxuryEditorial.description: High-end magazine aesthetic with rich textures, dramatic lighting, and sophisticated compositions

lifestyleAuthentic.name: Lifestyle Authentic
lifestyleAuthentic.description: Warm, approachable style focusing on real-life contexts and human connections

productHeroShot.title: Product Hero Shot
productHeroShot.description: Showcase your product in stunning detail with perfect lighting
productHeroShot.tips: Close-up details, premium feel, hero lighting

lifestyleContext.title: Lifestyle Context
lifestyleContext.description: Show how your product fits naturally into daily life
lifestyleContext.tips: Real environment, authentic usage, emotional connection

keyBenefitsHighlight.title: Key Benefits Highlight
keyBenefitsHighlight.description: Visually demonstrate what makes your product special
keyBenefitsHighlight.tips: Clear value prop, before/after, feature demonstration

chat.title: Creative Director Chat

limitations.title: Chat Information
limitations.description: I can answer questions about creative options, but workflow changes must be made using the selection cards above.

chat.placeholder: Discuss visual concepts, style preferences, or ask for creative recommendations...
chat.welcomeMessage: Hey there! I'm David, your Creative Director. I've received Maya's strategic insights about your product. Let's create some amazing visuals that capture your brand's essence and connect with your audience!
suggestions: What visual style best represents my brand personality?
Show me culturally appropriate color palette options
Generate background concepts that align with my target market
Create product hero shots that highlight key features
What scene compositions will maximize emotional impact?
How can we adapt this creative for different cultural markets?

positive: Excellent creative direction! This perfectly captures your brand's vision.
I love how this visual approach will resonate with your target audience.
This creative solution brilliantly balances artistry with commercial appeal.
The cultural sensitivity in this approach will serve your global goals well.
constructive: This has potential - let's refine the visual balance to strengthen the message.
Good direction, but we can enhance the cultural appropriateness for your market.
Solid concept - let's adjust the color psychology to better align with your brand values.
I see the vision - let's optimize the composition for maximum visual impact.

visualDecisions.title: Visual Decisions
visualDecisions.confirmMessage: Do you approve this visual direction for your commercial?
visualDecisions.approved: Visual direction approved and ready for asset generation
visualDecisions.justification: This visual direction works because it...

generating.title: Crafting your visual story...
generating.description: David is applying creative expertise to generate your assets

status.analyzing: Analyzing strategic context and creative opportunities...
status.ready: Ready for creative collaboration and development
status.creating: Generating visual assets with creative precision...

errors.assetGenerationFailed: Asset generation encountered a creative challenge. Let's try a different approach or adjust parameters.
errors.visualAnalysisFailed: Visual analysis couldn't process your request. Please check inputs and creative parameters.
errors.handoffFailed: Creative handoff processing failed. Please contact support for assistance.
errors.insufficientBudget: Insufficient budget remaining for additional asset generation. Consider optimizing current assets.
errors.invalidParameters: Creative parameters need adjustment. Please refine your visual requirements.
errors.processingTimeout: Creative processing is taking longer than expected. Please try again.
errors.culturalMismatch: The requested creative approach may not align with your target culture. Would you like alternative suggestions?
errors.brandMisalignment: This creative direction may not align with your brand strategy. Let's explore alternatives.
errors.qualityIssue: The generated asset doesn't meet our creative quality standards. Generating alternative...
errors.technicalLimitation: Technical limitations prevent this specific creative approach. Let me suggest alternatives.

feedback.requestCreativeInput: I'd love your creative input on this direction. What aspects resonate with your vision?
feedback.clarifyCreativeDirection: Could you help me understand your creative preferences better?
feedback.confirmCreativeChoices: Let's confirm these creative choices align with your brand objectives.
feedback.suggestCreativeRefinements: I have some creative refinements that could strengthen this approach.
feedback.explainCreativeReasoning: Let me explain the creative reasoning behind this recommendation.
feedback.offerCreativeAlternatives: Would you like to explore alternative creative directions?
feedback.validateCulturalApproach: Let's ensure this creative approach resonates with your target culture.
feedback.optimizeForBrand: We can optimize this creative approach for stronger brand alignment.

finalProduction.title: Ready for Video Production
finalProduction.description: All elements are in place. Let's create your professional commercial video!

personality.greeting: Hey there! Ready to bring your vision to life? I'm Zara, your Video Producer with 8+ years creating high-impact commercial content.
personality.introduction: I specialize in turning great creative direction into incredible video content using cutting-edge AI video generation technology.
personality.expertise: My expertise spans video production planning, AI-powered generation workflows, and multi-platform optimization.
personality.approach: I believe in balancing technical excellence with creative vision - every frame should serve both artistic impact and business objectives.
personality.collaboration: I'm here to handle the technical complexity while keeping your creative vision intact. Let's make this commercial shine!
